title: The Date: an interactive movie
brief_description: Based on the ‘choose your own adventure’ books from the 1980’s, the outcome of this interactive movie rests with the user. The shy boy central character has managed to score a date with the girl of his dreams - it is up to the user to determine whether he is successful or a miserable failure.
